title: Synthesis of 2.3 mg/mL of protein with an all Escherichia coli cell-free transcription-translation system
notes: Abstract reports 2.3 mg/mL in batch; expression lasts up to 10 h.

title: Cell-free protein synthesis enables high yielding synthesis of an active multicopper oxidase
notes: Reported yield 1.2 mg/mL after 20-h batch reaction.

title: Cell-free Protein Expression Using the Rapidly Growing Bacterium Vibrio natriegens
notes: Abstract reports >260 ug/mL sfGFP within 3 h; value recorded as 260.

title: Cell-free protein synthesis from genomically recoded bacteria enables multisite incorporation of noncanonical amino acids
notes: Yield 1,780 mg/L reported; CFPS reactions incubated 24 h.

title: Synthesis of milligram quantities of proteins using a reconstituted in vitro protein synthesis system
notes: Batch yield 0.38 mg/mL; reactions incubated 3 h at 37C.

title: A continuous-exchange cell-free protein synthesis system based on extracts from cultured insect cells
notes: CECF yield 57 ug/mL after 24 h (translation mixture).

title: High-yield cell-free synthesis of human EGFR by IRES-mediated protein translation in a continuous exchange cell-free reaction format
notes: Yield 237 ug/mL in microsomal fraction at 24 h (CECF).

title: High-yield production of proteins in a CHO cell-free system by continuous-exchange (CECF)
notes: Abstract reports yields up to 980 ug/mL; CECF incubation set to 48 h.

title: Long-term protein synthesis with PURE in a mesoscale dialysis system
notes: Reported 1.16 mg/mL over 12.5 days in dialysis system.

title: Integration of cell-free protein synthesis and purification in one microfluidic chip for on-demand production of recombinant protein
notes: Abstract reports 70 uL at 144.3 ug/mL per batch; time estimated from 0.2 uL/min flow rate (70/0.2=350 min).

title: On-chip manufacturing of synthetic proteins for point-of-care therapeutics
notes: Abstract reports 63 ng/uL (63 ug/mL) within 6 h.

title: Glycosylation-on-a-Chip: A Flow-Based Microfluidic System for Cell-Free Glycoprotein Biosynthesis
notes: Four-chip system produced 38.3 ug/mL in 2 h.

title: Long-lived protein expression in hydrogel particles: towards artificial cells
notes: Hydrogel particles produced 197 ug/mL after 4 h.

title: Constructive approach for synthesis of monoclonal antibodies using a reconstituted cell-free protein synthesis system
notes: Active IgG 124 ug/mL; reactions incubated 16 h at 37C.

title: Cell-free production of a therapeutic protein: expression, purification, and characterization of recombinant streptokinase using a CHO lysate
notes: Abstract reports 600 ug/mL tGFP in 2.5 h (also 500 ug/mL streptokinase).
